H0.text: Which snooker player was simply known as 'The Grinder'. Steve Davis

H1.text: Which snooker player was simply known as 'The Grinder'. Ronnie O'Sullivan

H2.text: Which snooker player was simply known as 'The Grinder'. John Higgins

H3.text: Which snooker player was simply known as 'The Grinder'. Cliff Thorburn

A4.text: Cliff Thorburn is nicknamed 'The Grinder' because of his slow, determined style of play
